title: Academic Listening Test 3 — Professional Skills
transcript: Recording one is a phone call arranging a careers consultation. Recording two is a workplace induction talk. Recording three is a group of colleagues designing a training workshop. Recording four is a lecture on behavioural economics.

questions.prompt: Which day is the appointment confirmed for?
What time is offered for the appointment?
What document does the adviser ask the caller to email beforehand?
Which seminar room should the caller report to?
What follow-up support is mentioned?
Which software system will new staff train on first?
Where are the health and safety briefings held?
What is the code for accessing the staff intranet?
When does payroll information need to be submitted?
Which department hosts the mentoring lunch?
Which topic is selected for the workshop?
How many breakout groups are proposed?
Which case study will be analysed first?
What engagement tool will they use for live polling?
How long will the feedback session last in minutes?
Which economist introduced the concept of 'nudge' mentioned in the lecture?
